circumstances:
While cruising off the Kuwait coast, the twin engine aircraft went out of control and crashed into the sea few km off shore. All six occupants were killed and only few debris were found. 
Crew:
G/C H. J. Irens, pilot,
Sgt Radley, signaler.
Passengers: 
G/C. A. M. Aberdein, 
W/C M. Dean, 
S/L R. H. Stevenson,
F/L Cranley.
probable_cause: Due to lack of evidence, the cause of the accident could not be determined with certainty.
